page.title: 01GENERAL INTRODUCTION
page.content: The designated area, primarily residential, was until the 1950's a green belt between the main townships of{Hebburn}and{South Shields. } Housing, mainly council, is in large estates.{Boldon Colliery,}a typical northern Victorian colliery settlement, is an exception to the pattern. The area is traversed by the{A1T, A194 (Newcastle-South {Shields Road)}and the{Newcastle to {Sunderland Railway. Farmland covers almost one-third of the area, most of it in the south-west of the block. Employment patterns have changed in recent years with the closure of traditional industries. There is increasing provision by the community for the elderly and for recreation.
